findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: Owner can mint tokens during and after the crowdsale without any restrictions, affecting total tokens available for purchase.

findings.title: Incorrect token release criteria
findings.description: Owner can mint tokens without any restrictions during and after the crowdsale, affecting total tokens available for purchase.

findings.title: Potential impact on total tokens available for purchase during crowdsale
findings.description: Owner can mint tokens during and after the crowdsale without any restrictions, affecting the total tokens available for purchase.

findings.title: Unrestricted minting by owner during crowdsale
findings.description: Owner can mint tokens during and after the crowdsale without any restrictions, affecting the total tokens available for purchase.

findings.title: Inconsistent units used for tokens
findings.description: Tokens are considered as Ethers in the contract which may confuse the reader. Consider changing it to an actual token count to increase readability.
